entry.dcterms:description: shopping habits of the family, expenses; the place of shopping, the detailed shopping list, how much, for what; food, clothes and personal services

consumption/consumer behavior
household
survey data
cross-section
Multi-stage stratified, random sample, representative of the population. If it was possible, the female member of the selected family was asked.
face-to-face interview
